Providers.CSO_Description: FormAssembly Government Cloud (FAGC) is a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) Cloud Service Offering (CSO) that allows federal government agencies to improve the way they collect and manage data. FAGC is a custom environment developed from the high-performance, high-security architecture that the commercial product, FormAssembly Cloud is built upon. FAGC’s form builder and data collection platform allows government professionals to streamline complex workflows, eliminate tedious manual data entry, and drive quality form conversions—all while maintaining the highest standards of security and compliance. FAGC integrates seamlessly with Salesforce and other commonly used systems to further take the hassle out of collecting and managing large amounts of sensitive data.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Gordian Federal Cloud powered by RSMeans Data
Providers.CSO_Description:
Gordian Federal Cloud is an enterprise Software as a Service (SaaS) solution powered by RSMeans data. The cloud-based solution is a comprehensive suite of modules designed to securely provide federal users with the tools and cost data to better manage construction and facilities estimates, contracts and pricing proposals. Decision-makers are empowered with up-to-date information that will deliver accurate and competitive bids, minimize the risk of cost overruns, reduce variability and gain control over costs.
Gordian is the leader in facility and construction cost data, software and services for all phases of the building lifecycle. A pioneer of Job Order Contracting, Gordian’s solutions also include our proprietary RSMeans data and Sightlines facility benchmarking and analysis. From planning to design, procurement, construction and operations, Gordian’s solutions help clients maximize efficiency, optimize cost savings and increase building quality.

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.CSO_Description: The HealthVerity IPGE Platform includes a state-of-the-art Privacy Preserving Record Linkage (PPRL) identity management solution that is the leading SaaS solution to de-identify and match individuals at scale in a privacy-protecting fashion across multiple datasets with the highest level of accuracy. It acts as an honest broker service that permits centralized de-identified linkage of individual person-level records across systems, organizations, and settings over time. HealthVerity technology supports key applications that require the ability to create a unique anonymized identifier that can unify data across source systems while meeting privacy standards such as HIPAA. The solution can be implemented using either batch processing or real-time API-enabled record linkage to support multi-party data integration needs for applications and analytics.

The Huron Accelerators Portal (HAP) is a web-based entry portal, hosted on AWS GovCloud. HAP is composed of three components: the Leader Evaluation Manager® (LEM) software application, the Patient Call Manager™ (PCM) software application, and the Huron Rounding software application.

* Leader Evaluation Manager: Through research and more than a decade of working with healthcare organizations, Huron has perfected and accelerated the art and science of goal cascading, weighting and accountability for leaders to build consistency — and as consistency grows, so does engagement. With Leader Evaluation Manager® (LEM), organizations can guarantee that all employees get the same leadership experience, practice the same evidence-based tactics and are held accountable to the same behavioral standards. Use LEM to track and manage the components that take accountability to the next level.
 
* Patient Call Manager: Checking on a patient at a critical point in their care is proven to have an impact. Whether it’s showing empathy or providing a clinical intervention, these calls improve patient safety and experiences — and offer an opportunity to receive first-hand feedback from patients. With Patient Call Manager™ (PCM), healthcare organizations can prioritize and connect patients with caregivers to ease transitions from in-person care to home. This fully HIPAA-compliant tool allows healthcare staff to serve as quality touchpoints and ensure quality outcomes along a patient’s continuum of care from pre-visit calls through post-visit.
 
* Huron Rounding: A cloud-based, multiplatform technology, the Huron Rounding application helps organizations easily collect quality, safety, satisfaction, and other audit and compliance data for analysis and reporting.

IBM’s Federal HR Cloud solution for federal government offers a configurable human capital management SaaS solution.  As part of this solution, IBM delivers functionality for the complete suite of core HR processing including personnel action processing, compensation management, benefits administration, performance management, time and leave management, payroll services, employee and manager self-service, intelligent automation, and cognitive decision support to allow HR leaders enable cognitive HR enterprise.

IBM Security™ Verify (ISV) is a Government-Only Community SaaS acting as an identity-as-a-service (IDaaS) solution that features comprehensive cloud IAM capabilities, from deep risk-based authentication to automated consent management. ISV customers can integrate the product into their own login pages to manage user logins and support many different access control components including SSO and Personal Identity Verification/Common Access Card (PIV/CAC) via Security Access Markup Language (SAML), MFA, and Social Media authentication. Customers activate ISV’s different authentication methods according to their needs using application programming interfaces (APIs) controlled in a client specific management portal hosted by IBM.

With over 4,000 customers, including the largest government, financial, insurance, energy and technology organizations, iboss provides users direct and secure access to cloud applications from wherever they work. iboss transitions organizations from protecting in-office workers to protecting the modern work-from-anywhere workforce while providing fast, secure and direct connections to cloud applications to increase productivity and  protect organizations from malware and data loss. A Gartner Magic Quadrant “Visionary”, and backed by 230+ issued and pending patents, iboss processes and secures over 150 billion daily network transactions globally and has built the largest containerized cloud security fabric. The iboss Government Cloud Platform enables agencies to modernize their architecture, by reducing the dependency or eliminating the need for traditional network security appliances that are no longer effective at protecting today’s hybrid workforce. Jump-start your SASE transformation and experience the future of cloud security today

BloxOne Threat Defense Federal Cloud is a suite of capabilities that enable organizations to defend their networks, conduct threat investigations and research, and provide rapid correlation/contextualization to minimize incident response times.  B1TD FedCloud contains millions of verified indicators in vendor agnostic formats that may be exported to facilitate detection, blocking, and containment of modern malware (e.g. APT, ransomware, phishing, exploits) via an open API and an analyst research portal.

Government agencies need a better, faster, more reliable approach to integrate and deliver timely data and analytics to users and business systems that rely on data. Whether you’re delivering analytics, building a data warehouse, migrating a data warehouse to the cloud, or building real-time application processes, you need a high-performance, easy-to-use data integration service that connects to on-premises data sources, cloud applications, and cloud platforms to seamlessly integrate high volumes of data, so that you can get up and running quickly.

FedRAMP IICS is a microservices-based, automated, AI-powered, and cloud-native data management solution. All of the FedRAMP IICS components and integrated Informatica solutions described below incorporate the CLAIRE™ artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning engine, which leverages industry-leading metadata capabilities to accelerate and automate core data management and data governance functions. 

FedRAMP IICS includes support for both Cloud Data Integration and Cloud Application Integration:

**Cloud Data Integration**

Built on a next-generation, microservices-driven software as a service (SaaS), Informatica® Cloud Data Integration enables you to connect to industry-leading applications and data sources across on-premises and the cloud and allows you to integrate the data sources at scale. Optimize the performance of your development teams by employing a codeless UI to build new integrations using drag-and-drop interfaces, making complex integrations simple. Speed up new initiatives with pre-built templates to get teams up and running more quickly, even for very involved scenarios.  

**Cloud Application Integration**

Informatica® Cloud Application Integration (CAI) service offers a single, trusted solution to
support any integration pattern, data set, user-type or endpoint to automate business processes, expedite transactions and enable real-time analytics. It is based on a modular, microservices based architecture for agile support of future business requirements. CAI supports multiple new and unique integration patterns, which include on-premises to cloud real-time data integration, real-time/B2B application integration, process orchestration, data synchronization, and more. Users can integrate multi-cloud and hybrid applications, without writing a single line of code.

The Iron Mountain InSight system is a cloud-based Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution that provides customers with a content services platform that leverages Machine Learning (ML) and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to automatically classify, extract, and enrich physical and digital content.

The Issio workforce optimization system helps organizations refine workforce processes, improve efficiency and lower costs.   The highly customizable, user-friendly platform offers a suite of tools that include long and short term staff scheduling, multi-location labor float pool management, robust communications, data modeling, benchmarking, and predictive analytics.

Ivalua GovCloud is a complete, end-to-end acquisition management platform, purpose built for federal, state and local governments to more effectively manage all aspects of the acquisition lifecycle.

With Ivalua GovCloud, acquisition professionals and contract officers have a single solution to manage all phases of the acquisition process, from requirements gathering and market research to contract award and close out, enabling:

* Increased compliance with FAR/DFARs through a fully integrated contract clause library
* Minimize paper-based processes and streamline the acquisition planning and market research
* Improved security, auditability and control of acquisition data and documents
* Maximized automation through a powerful workflow engine to streamline approvals and reduce the cost per transaction
* Improved compliance and more efficient audit response through automated contract file creation and management
* Real-time data access and reporting across all acquisition phases, providing the decision support required for agile acquisition

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description: The Juvare Federal Cloud provides software to empower emergency preparedness and response professionals to protect people, property, and brands. The Juvare Federal Cloud combines the emergency preparedness and response software solutions WebEOC, Juvare Exchange, and DesignStudio together in a ready-to-use SaaS offering. Running in the AWS GovCloud, Juvare handles provisioning, infrastructure, software deployment, security, backups, maintenance, monitoring, and support to ensure program success. The environment has been architected according to NIST and CIS guidance to provide FedRAMP High authorization.

Kahua is a leading provider of capital program and construction project management software. Government agencies use Kahua’s collaborative construction management solutions to improve efficiency, lower costs and reduce project risk throughout the lifecycle of their capital programs. Kahua’s purpose-built solutions for agencies, program managers and contractors enable rapid implementation that minimizes time-to-value and enhances user adoption. And with the industry’s only low-code application platform agencies can easily customize existing Kahua apps or even build their own new apps to run their programs and projects at peak efficiency today and rapidly adapt as conditions dictate.

Kahua’s collaborative solutions include:

* Capital Planning
* Design Management
* Bid Management
* Cost Management
* Construction Administration
* Asset Handover

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
Keeper Security Government Cloud (KSGC) transforms the way government organizations protect  their operations against password-related data breaches and cyberthreats including ransomware and phishing attacks. KSGC provides IT administrators with visibility, management and control over their organization’s password security, monitoring and reporting. The KSGC cybersecurity platform utilizes a zero-trust framework and zero-knowledge security architecture and integrates with on-premise, cloud and hybrid-cloud environments.  

KSGC utilizes granular, role-based administrative controls including delegated administration. IT Administrators can enforce critical internal control policies including password complexity, IP white listing, two-factor authentication and Data Loss Prevention (DLP).  KSGC’s modern provisioning tools allow organizations to rapidly deploy cybersecurity protection to thousands of users, on all their devices, and can integrate with any identity stack including AD, LDAP, SSO (SAML), SCIM and APIs. The cybersecurity platform includes robust event logging, reporting and auditing capabilities with seamless integration with Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) systems.

PhishER is a lightweight Security Orchestration, Automation and Response (SOAR) platform to orchestrate threat response and manage the volume of potentially malicious email messages reported by users.  PhishER includes automatic prioritization of email to help teams identify risks and respond to the most dangerous threats more quickly. PhishER can also automate the workstream of the reported emails that are not threats.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
Knowledge Services dotStaff™ is a Software as a Service (SaaS) offering that includes a Vendor Management System and a Survey Management module. The dotStaff Vendor Management System allows for organizations to manage the contractor life cycle, statement of work bidding, tracking, and selection where contingent or temporary labor is used. Government customers enter position requisitions or projects that are viewable by Contractors, who can submit responsive bids. Activity associated with the winning bid is entered, tracked, and reported. The Survey Management module provides survey automation capabilities, and can be configured to survey certain locations, property types and/or resident classifications. Customers can send survey links, schedule face to face interviews, request information through the Survey Management module.

**Survey Management**

The dotStaff™ Survey module delivers real-time, automated surveys which enhance access to actionable data. The module automates and improves the performance of in-person, mobile, web-based, and telephone surveys, including scheduling and data reporting. 

**Vendor/Consortium Management**

The dotStaff™ Vendor Management System allows for organizations to manage the contractor life cycle, statement of work bidding, tracking, and selection where contingent or temporary labor is used.

**Field Based / Mobile Worker Management**

All services allow field-based and mobile workforce support through the dotStaff™ mobile application.

The KUDO Software-as-a-Service is an interactive and real-time multilingual video conferencing platform that enables language translation in real-time, thus allowing participants to meet and interact in their native language. Hosted and secured in a government approved cloud environment, KUDO is powered by a network of thousands of professional interpreters supporting meetings in 80+ languages. KUDO Products include:

* KUDO Core – a secure cloud-based video conferencing platform with real-time multilingual interpretation
* KUDO Marketplace - a cloud-based enterprise ready marketplace enabling on-demand booking of a network of thousands of professional conference interpreters
* KUDO Vote – a cloud-based secure voting software for video conferencing that enables Parliamentary-style voting capabilities

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
LaunchDarkly is the feature management platform that teams use to safely deliver and control software through feature flags. By separating code deployments from feature releases, feature management enables organizations to deploy faster, reduce risk, and iterate continuously. 

Government agencies use feature management to control new feature rollouts, quickly resolve incidents, and increase productivity of development teams while using fewer resources. They are improving their DevSecOps processes, facilitating Continuous Integration/Continuous Delivery (CI/CD), and shipping more code safer than ever. LaunchDarkly enables: 

* Resolution of incidents in less than 200 milliseconds, without costly rollbacks that threaten other features.
* Powerful targeting capabilities that provide complete control over which users or microservices can see new features.
* Safe testing in production—empowering teams with real-world QA testing in place of costly pre-production environments.
* CI/CD development processes that improve developer productivity and new feature release times.
* Hypothesis driven development, including A/B/n experimentation and percentage rollouts.

LaunchDarkly provides developers and business stakeholders with a central location to manage the rollout of new features. At the same time, it can enforce change management policies through scheduling, approval workflows, and custom role-based access control down to the feature level. Agencies can implement their own policies around the use of personally identifiable information (PII) and can take full advantage of targeting without needing to store user PII within the LaunchDarkly Federal SaaS environment. Additional hosting options and an offline mode are available for organizations with more restrictive policies.

The LifeOmic Precision Health Platform for Government (PHP-G) is a cloud and mobile Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) offering designed to aggregate health related data for storage, analytics, and the creation of predictive (Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning (AI/ML)) models.

InfraLink, formerly known as Infrastructure Maintenance Management System (IMMS), integrates the cyber-physical systems lifecycle from design through implementation and sustainment, enabling configuration management and providing a systematic approach to planning and continuous improvement across project activities. Rely on InfraLink to support all aspects of critical infrastructure management.
  
* **Configuration Baselines** - Effectively manage system security, planned maintenance, issue management, and systems availability/performance reporting by ensuring the integrity of your system baseline configurations. InfraLink supports customization to each system element.
* **Preventive Maintenance** - Ensure critical systems and equipment availability and avoid unplanned outages. Based on the concepts of reliability-centered maintenance, InfraLink provides a foundation for effective scheduling, tracking, and performance management activities. Model data, capture tools, and electronic forms document and validate information in near-real time. 
* **Issues Management & Analysis** - InfraLink’s flexible and customizable ticketing system allows you to define work categories and workflows that align with program scope and priorities, set service level agreement (SLA) milestones, and capture customized status-specific issue attributes. Comprehensive case details help you better assess system and process performance, conduct effective root cause analysis and ensure individual accountability.
* **Installation Management** - InfraLink allows project teams to effectively track complex system implementation workflows, from simple component testing and installation to the integration of complex subsystems and hundreds of components. InfraLink enables effective planning and data integrity, which promote worker safety, accountability, and coordination across job functions.
* **Materials Inventory** - Avoid work delays caused by stock shortages and extensive inventory carrying costs through effective inventory management. InfraLink helps you plan replacements based on a reliable configuration baseline, performance history and operational priorities, while streamlining stringent Government and enterprise property reporting requirements.
* **Reporting** - Maintain a comprehensive assessment of your systems and team performance. InfraLink provides a range of standard and customizable reports and dashboards that offer critical insights to support ongoing improvements in systems performance and management.

The Manhattan Government Cloud provides US government agencies and customers supporting the US government a secure and reliable enterprise supply chain and logistics system. This system supports a comprehensive set of logistics functions: purchasing, ordering, replenishment, fulfillment, supplier integration, inventory management, overall supply chain visibility, warehouse management, asset tracking, transportation procurement, transportation planning, transportation execution, delivery, and acceptance. This highly configurable SaaS solution supports government missions such as disaster relief, humanitarian aid, homeland security, warfighter support, food supply, government IT, and supply chain security.

Manhattan Government Cloud currently offers the following Manhattan Associates products: Warehouse Management for Open Systems, Transportation Planning & Execution, Transportation Procurement, Supply Chain Visibility, Supply Chain Event Management, Supplier Enablement, Hub Management, Operational Supply Chain Intelligence, Distributed Order Management, and Manhattan Integration Framework.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Cloud Security Platform powered by Isolation Core™
Providers.CSO_Description:
Menlo Security delivers security and data policy, including ransomware and malware prevention from a cloud-native platform. This shift from traditional on-premises deployment allows agencies to secure users anywhere, on any device, accessing any applications.

**Menlo Cloud Security Platform with Isolation Core™**

Utilizing our cloud platform powered by an elastic Isolation Core ™, Menlo Security secures access to the web (Secure Web Gateway - SWG) and SaaS applications (Cloud Access Security Broker – CASB), preventing malware, ransomware, and unauthorized access. It also ensures that data security policies are enforced to prevent malicious or unintentional data theft (Data Loss Prevention – DLP).

A user’s access to an Internet website is secured with URL categorization, File Hashcheck, Antivirus, and Cloud Sandbox. Based on an administrator-defined policy, if a website is isolated, Menlo instantiates a browser on the user’s behalf in the Menlo platform. This remote browser connects to the target website and all the active content from the website is executed in the remote browser rather than on the end user device. Only the safe visuals are sent to the user’s browser--ensuring the user is protected from any web threat.

The Menlo Security cloud will auto-scale as demand increases, enabling users to work securely without impact, even in times of high workload volume. Consistent security policy and visibility can be enforced at a cloud location in close proximity to the user, ensuring the highest performance.

Meridian Learning Management System (LMS) helps federal, state, and local government organizations and their extended network of contractors and vendors address mission-critical training issues. The Meridian LMS provides organizations with the ability to easily create, catalog, manage, track and report on all learning activities, including online, instructor-led, video-based courses as well as SCORM, AICC, and xAPI compliant e-learning. Meridian LMS includes ad-hoc reporting modules and is built to meet the needs of the public sector.

Office 365 GCC High is a Software as a Service offering with government specific instances of some services including Exchange Online, SharePoint Online, OneDrive for Business, Skype for Business, and Microsoft Teams. The government specific instances are designated for the sole use of U.S federal, tribal, state, and local government customers, U.S. government contractors, and Federally Funded Research and Development Centers (FFRDCs). Office 365 delivers customers with familiar productivity, communication and collaboration capabilities all in a service that is reliable, secure and able to rapidly scale up or down to meet variable resource demands. The Office 365 GCC High environment delivers compliance with Defense Federal Acquisition Regulations Supplement (DFARS) and International Traffic in Arms Regulations (ITAR)..

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
MicroStrategy is the world’s top-rated platform for enterprise analytics. The MicroStrategy Intelligence Platform offers a full range of trusted, modern BI experiences, and is designed to help departments and agencies build data-driven cultures and make faster, smarter decisions. 

Built for performance at scale, MicroStrategy delivers concrete answers to users where and when they’re needed. Foundationally, the platform offers a range of 200+ out-of-the-box drivers and gateways for a variety of data sources, types, and formats, and a robust suite of APIs and SDKs that allow users to integrate data into a unified data fabric to meet the needs of their entire organization. Using the platform’s proprietary enterprise semantic graph, agencies can establish a unified, governed, secure, and reusable data model on which a variety of intelligence solutions can be built to deliver accurate, personalized, and trusted information to individual users based on each agency’s enterprise data dictionary. 

The MicroStrategy Cloud for Government is a fully managed enterprise analytics solution that offers all the market-leading capabilities of the MicroStrategy Intelligence Platform on a unique Amazon Web Services (AWS) GovCloud implementation. MicroStrategy Cloud for Government features a fully optimized reference architecture built specifically for deployment in a customer-licensed AWS environment, offered as a platform-as-a-service (PaaS) solution. MicroStrategy administers each unique MicroStrategy Cloud for Government environment on the behalf of each government department or agency, including steady state operations, routine application of software upgrades, robust system monitoring and alerting, and 24/7/365 technical support for priority issues.

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.CSO_Description: MongoDB Atlas for Government is a cloud database service that provides the versatility needed to modernize legacy applications and supports the unique requirements and missions of the government. Building on MongoDB’s intuitive data model and query API, Atlas for Government handles operational and administrative tasks with best-in-class automation and delivers advanced security and data distribution capabilities. Atlas for Government is FedRAMP Ready and is available in AWS GovCloud regions and AWS FedRAMP Moderate regions (US East/West).

MHME is a Software as a Service (SaaS) application that automates and streamlines federal human resource recruitment, hiring, and management. MHME is a Moderate impact system, in production since January 1, 2003, and currently supporting over 68 federal customers.

Motorola Solutions is expanding its “Mission Critical Ecosystem” which consists of a suite of software and technology that supports mission critical communications in evolving ways and that provides fast access to actionable information.  The purpose of the Motorola Solutions Federal Cloud (MSFC) is to serve as the platform upon which the applications and solutions that are part of this Mission Critical Ecosystem will securely operate to provide our U.S. Federal Government users with enhanced capabilities.

Primary to our Federal Cloud offering as our initial secure cloud application is the APX NEXT smart radio, a next-generation P25 platform purpose-built for first responders to access and act on information while maintaining focus in critical situations.   The Motorola Solutions Federal Cloud enables  APX NEXT and additional SaaS services to provide new Common Operating Picture (COP) capabilities to the U.S. Department of Homeland Security, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement agents, federal Law Enforcement Officers (LEOs), first responders and public safety personnel in the field with a new ownership experience to Operation and Support personnel.

The Motorola Solutions Federal Cloud underlying architecture is reinforced by a modern and comprehensive application of security technology.  

Once deployed, our cloud services production systems are monitored 24x7x365 by Motorola Solutions’ Security Operations Center using state-of-the-art Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) technology.

Netskope's Security Cloud (NSC) platform is a highly scalable, secure solution that processes and protects customer data traffic without the need to deploy on-premise physical hardware. The NSC services help customers eliminate cloud blind spots and to quickly analyze, target and control activities across thousands of cloud services and millions of websites with full control from one cloud platform. The full suite of services provided through the NSC provides 360-degree data protection that guards data backed by advanced threat protection that stops intrusive attacks.

NSC’s services provide real-time analytics and policies for third-party applications used by its customers. The service allows for the termination of private cloud-based Software as a Service (SaaS) applications as well as standard web traffic to a single Netskope cloud endpoint that allows for auditing and policy enforcement on the use of these applications and web sites. NSC enables businesses to use SaaS applications and web services while still being compliant with business and/or auditing policies.

Nintex Workflow Cloud for Government allows government organizations to automate both simple and sophisticated business processes, such as approving and signing documents, or hiring and onboarding employees.

With a simple drag-and-drop, no-code interface, users can design workflows, forms and tasks, and integrate third-party platforms such as Salesforce, Microsoft Office, Zendesk and more, and create a seamless experience that minimizes manual touchpoints and streamlines efficiency.

Through Workflow Connections, organizations control which third-party services they connect their workflows to, and know their data is secure and compliant throughout the process.

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.CSO_Description: The Nuna Value Platform helps healthcare plans and providers succeed in value-based care arrangements. The Nuna Value Platform provides the infrastructure, systems, tools, and techniques needed to gather, manage, model and analyze healthcare data from disparate sources.  Our mission is to reduce the cost of medical care and improve its quality with data-driven insights.

The Ontario Cloud Federal (OCF) platform makes use of a unique Software-as-a-Service architecture deployed in Amazon Web Services GovCloud region. OCF is an intuitive and easy-to-use, cloud-based solution with features that provides cloud-based technologies for healthcare, payments, and accounts receivables management. This cloud-based software is hosted on the FedRAMP-authorized Amazon Web Services GovCloud Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS). OCF is secured with a multi-layered defense in depth architecture based on the FedRAMP controls.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: OnSolve Platform for Critical Event Management
Providers.CSO_Description: OnSolve provides leading-edge technology that keeps people safer and strengthens government, business and community crisis response.  The OnSolve Critical Event Management platform provides unparalleled coverage of critical events around the world, as well as the actionable intelligence needed to understand their impact. This platform combines our AI-powered risk intelligence, award-winning critical communications, and enhanced incident management to create better outcomes for people, communities and organizations.  With over two billion notifications sent annually and over 60 years of proven support to both the public and private sectors, OnSolve delivers critical event management solutions backed by unmatched industry expertise, which gives our customers the ability to proactively keep everyone informed, instill confidence, foster teamwork, mitigate disruptions, improve operational outcomes, protect assets, and save lives.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description: OpusGov is a Moderate PaaS and IaaS, Government-Only Cloud Service Offering (CSO) that intends to provide federal clients with secure infrastructure to deploy and scale resources without the direct overhead associated with on-premises data facilities. OpusGov is a custom environment based on the high performance, high security architecture that OpusCloud, the commercial product, is built upon. The OpusGov primary system resides in the Iron Mountain datacenter in Manassas, Virginia, which maintains FISMA High authorization. Iron Mountain enforces all physical and environmental controls through a Data Center Customer Agreement with Opus Interactive who accepts all responsibilities for the physical and environmental controls, which were tested by A-LIGN as part of the Readiness Assessment. The OpusGov secondary site is located at the Data Bank facility in Dallas, Texas. Data Bank enforces all physical and environmental controls through a Master Service Agreement with Opus Interactive.

ORock HighCloud is an enterprise-grade open source cloud environment built specifically to meet the data security needs of U.S. Federal Government agencies. This Government-Only Community Cloud implements more than 421 High Baseline security controls to support Federal cloud services requirements for Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS) and Platform as a Service (PaaS). It provides secure, compliant, scalable access to computing, storage, virtualization, networking, and performance monitoring resources.
Architected to meet the most stringent requirements for security, performance, cost predictability, and control, ORock HighCloud utilizes ORock’s private, carrier-grade fiber optic backbone network with dedicated connectivity between all points of presence and no upstream cloud service provider (CSP). Additional security features include ORock’s use of Red Hat Security Enhanced Linux, FIPS 140-2 encryption, and SOC 2 Type II data centers. Managed services are provided entirely by U.S. citizens in ORock’s U.S.-based Network Operations Center (NOC) and Security Operations Center (SOC).
As a Red Hat Premier Certified Cloud and Service Provider (CCSP), ORock Technologies architected ORock HighCloud as a “pure-play” Red Hat cloud and incorporated a full suite of open source solutions for enhanced flexibility, interoperability, security, and control. The Red Hat Cloud Suite includes: Red Hat Enterprise Linux; Red Hat OpenStack Platform; Red Hat OpenShift, Red Hat Virtualization; Red Hat Ceph Storage; Red Hat Ansible Tower; Red Hat Satellite; and all associated cloud APIs. It is the first and only cloud environment built on Red Hat OpenStack Platform and Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform to achieve FedRAMP Ready status as a High Baseline cloud.
A Federal Small Business, ORock Technologies provides infrastructure, cloud, and compliance services to U.S. government agencies and commercial organizations in highly regulated industries. ORock HighCloud services feature a flat-rate billing model for data transport with no egress fees for predictable costs and lower total cost of ownership, as well as extensive use of enterprise-grade open source technologies (hardened and supported by Red Hat) to increase flexibility and minimize vendor lock-in.
Additional information is available at [http://orocktech.com](http://orocktech.com/) .

Zingbox® IoT Guardian discovers, identifies, secures, monitors and optimizes the use of connected medical devices, industrial control systems, physical security systems, and other non-traditional IT. Using Zingbox, federal agencies can safely enable IoT devices in their facilities while optimizing their lifecycle management.

PC Matic Federal provides essential security that satisfies NIST 800-53 CM-7 (5) Least Functionality and fills other potential gaps left by traditional endpoint security software. With a foundation in application whitelisting, PC Matic uses a default-deny approach that prevents all known bad and untrusted applications from executing. Our patented globally automated whitelist technology provides a backbone of millions of known good applications to remove the headaches that come with traditional application whitelisting solutions by drastically reducing false positives during and after implementation.

PC Matic Federal is hosted on the FedRAMP Authorized Hybrid ORockCloud and is operated by employees that are all U.S. citizens working for a U.S.-based company.  PC Matic has partnered with NIST on implementing a Zero Trust Architecture using application whitelisting as required by the recent executive order on improving cybersecurity.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
PingOne for Government is a cloud service offering that gives commercial suppliers and Federal agencies the identity and access management services they need to enable the right individual to access the right resource, at the right time, for the right reason in support of federal business objectives.

PingOne for Government is a suite of services that includes three products/components:

* PingFederate is an enterprise federation server that enables user authentication and single sign-on (SSO). It is designed to serve as a global authentication authority that allows employees, contractors, and partners to access the applications they need from any device securely. PingFederate easily integrates with applications across the enterprise, third-party authentication sources, user directories, and existing IAM systems, leveraging integration kits and identity standards like OAuth, OpenID Connect, SAML, and WS-Federation. And with full support for x.509 PKI certificates, organizations can expand the use of their existing PIV and CAC authenticators to allow for MFA wherever their users are.

* PingAccess is a centralized access security solution with a comprehensive policy engine. It helps provide secure access to applications and APIs down to the URL level and ensures that only authorized users can access the resources they need. Additionally, PingAccess can enable SSO for web applications and APIs; when used in combination with PingFederate for authentication and token services, both internal and external users can gain secure access to applications.

* PingDirectory is a high-performance, extensible data store for citizen, mission partner, and government employee and contractor identity data. PingDirectory allows agencies to manage profiles for a multiplicity of channels and devices.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
**Pitney Bowes SendPro®360 Sending, Receiving, and Locker Solution**
 
Pitney Bowes **SendPro 360** is a comprehensive, cloud-based sending, receiving, locker, and analytics solution that powers your mailroom operations for maximum efficiency and transparency. SendPro 360 offers a lightweight footprint that allows users to track, ship, and mail without significant hardware requirements.  

**Multi-Carrier Shipping and Mailing**

SendPro 360 makes mailing and shipping quick and easy by empowering departments with the flexibility to send in the way that’s right for them.  Users save time and money by printing stamps directly from the online interface and by accessing SendPro 360 multi-carrier shipping functionality to compare rates and print labels across major carriers.  The ability to track spend and activity by account or department, facilitates project or departmental chargebacks for accurate accounting.  SendPro360 includes a dedicated certified and electronic return receipt (ERR) and registered mailing process with proof of delivery reporting. Also, qualified users can prepare ship requests for packages sent to the mailroom for processing.

**Package Receiving, Tracking and Delivery**

The SendPro 360 platform automates the process of receiving, tracking and delivering incoming packages and mail through a simple scan of a barcode.  Manually logging items instantly becomes a process of the past. It can configure delivery routes, provide lists of packages, and has the ability to manage assets. Package tracking notifications via email and SMS as well as SLA management simplify and enhance the experience.  

**Intelligent Lockers**

Keep packages secure and users safe via monitored delivery and contactless pickup with SendPro 360 Intelligent Locker capabilities. This solution modernizes package pickup with convenient 24/7 self-service access, barcode scanning and automated alerts notifying recipients they have packages. Upon package pickup, recipient photos or optional signatures can be captured for proof of receipt. Lockers free up crowded mail room space, mitigate risk of lost or stolen packages or assets, preserve chain-of-custody and provide next generation customer experience. The superior build quality and durability ensures lockers and contents are always secure. Lockers have additional features to simplify administrative functions, delivery and departmental management. 

**Analytics**

From smaller mailrooms to multi-location operations, SendPro 360 offers complete visibility into your receiving and sending operations. Dynamic views can be filtered by divisions, locations, cost accounts, and users, across any date range. View and manage postage and shipping spend, and gain insights to your receiving and locker metrics all the way through final delivery to ensure packages and mail are accounted for and delivered on time.
    
Gauge performance, operator efficiency, and resource utilization to ensure service level agreement (SLA) metrics are being met. To locate a package, SendPro 360 provides end-to-end tracking of packages, locker activity, as well as shipping and mailing activity across your government agency.

Providers.CSO_Description: Point Blue Conservation Science (Point Blue) hosts the multi-user Software as a Service (SaaS) named the Point Blue Science Cloud, a collection of tools that manage, share, curate, and analyze scientifically collected biodiversity observations and samples in support of the Avian Knowledge Network.  These tools include data-rich, interactive websites that integrate bird and other indicator species data with ecosystem and climate change data to improve conservation outcomes today and in the future. Many tools incorporate original research data from Point Blue scientists and our partners. The Point Blue Science Cloud is used by Federal agencies, State agencies, local government agencies, non-for-profit organizations, and other conservation-minded individuals. Federal agencies use the Point Blue Science Cloud to manage and curate observations, conduct research, and analyze information related to wildlife and ecosystems.  Point Blue Conservation Science is a 501(C)(3) non-profit organization with a mission to conserve birds, other wildlife and ecosystems through science, partnerships, and outreach.

The TRAIN Learning Network is the trusted leader in providing training and other learning opportunities to public health, healthcare, behavioral health, preparedness, and other health professionals across government agencies through an innovative, flexible learning platform designed around agency needs, workforce requirements, and learner interaction.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description: Qlik Cloud Government is a multi-tenant Software-as-a Service Cloud offering that provides U.S Public Sector clients with a complete data analytics platform that sets the benchmark for a new generation of analytics. With its one-of-a-kind associative analytics engine, sophisticated augmented intelligence, and high performance cloud platform, you can empower everyone in your organization to make better decisions daily, creating a truly data-driven enterprise.

IRBNet on GovCloud

IRBNet is the leading provider of research compliance solutions for Institutional Review Boards (IRBs), Institutional Biosafety Committees (IBCs), Institutional Animal Care and Use Committees (IACUCs), Research & Development, Radiation Safety, Scientific Review, Conflict of Interest (COI) and more.  IRBNet's powerful suite of web-based, Software as a Service (SaaS), electronic submission, collaboration and workflow tools currently serves thousands of research institutions, compliance boards and sponsors, and hundreds of thousands of users across IRBNet's National Research Network and IRBNet’s Government Community Cloud offering, IRBNet on GovCloud.

Launched in 2005 as the first SaaS research compliance solution, IRBNet offers the world's leading and most widely used toolset for institutions of any size, serving hospitals and hospital networks, universities and academic research institutions, and federal and state agencies.  IRBNet provides secure online access to comprehensive research oversight tools anywhere, anytime, including real-time collaboration between investigators and institutions anywhere in the world, helping to streamline compliance workflow, reduce review and approval cycle times, reduce errors and non-compliance, increase staff efficiency, and improve audit trails and record keeping.  IRBNet's fully integrated and configurable research compliance tools support all institutional compliance offices, their investigators and board members, including Institutional Review Board (IRB), Institutional Biosafety Committee (IBC), Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC), Research & Development, Radiation Safety, Scientific Review, Conflict of Interest (COI) and more.

IRBNet on GovCloud is the Government Community Cloud offering of the IRBNet SaaS.  Powerful and secure, IRBNet on GovCloud is hosted in multiple availability zones within the Amazon Web Services (AWS) FedRAMP-authorized GovCloud Infrastructure.  All AWS GovCloud data centers are within the Continental United States (CONUS) and meet the High Impact-level requirements specified by the Federal Risk and Authorization Management Program (FedRAMP).
  
IRBNet on GovCloud is managed by Research Dataware LLC, an operating unit of WIRB-Copernicus Group, Inc. (WCG).   WCG is the world’s leading provider of solutions that measurably improve the quality and efficiency of clinical research. The industry’s first clinical services organization (CSO), WCG enables biopharmaceutical companies, CROs, and institutions to accelerate the delivery of new treatments and therapies to patients, while maintaining the highest standards of human subject protection.

To find out more about how IRBNet on GovCloud can serve your Agency, please contact:  govsupport@irbnet.org

RSA SecurID® Access Federal, enables the U.S. Federal Government and the public sector organizations  to digitally transform, embrace the benefits of modern technologies, and operate nimbly with highly secure and convenient cloud-based identity assurance. Building on the enterprise-grade security that is the hallmark of all RSA SecurID Access solutions, RSA SecurID® Access Federal meets the high standards required by the FedRAMP authorization process and is a key component of Zero Trust initiatives. When coupled with RSA’s on-prem offering, Federal Agencies can quickly and cost-effectively move to the cloud at their own pace, leveraging existing infrastructure and authentication methods.

RSA SecurID® Access Federal, enables the U.S. Federal Government and the public sector organizations  to digitally transform, embrace the benefits of modern technologies, and operate nimbly with highly secure and convenient cloud-based identity assurance. Building on the enterprise-grade security that is the hallmark of all RSA SecurID Access solutions, RSA SecurID® Access Federal meets the high standards required by the FedRAMP authorization process and is a key component of Zero Trust initiatives. When coupled with RSA’s on-prem offering, Federal Agencies can quickly and cost-effectively move to the cloud at their own pace, leveraging existing infrastructure and authentication methods.

Providers.CSO_Description: The SAS Cloud for Government (SAS Cloud) is a Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) Cloud Service Offering (CSO) that intends to provide federal clients with a platform that current and future SAS software offerings may be hosted. The SAS Cloud environment is hosted within SAS’ datacenter and managed by SAS resources. SAS Cloud is a multi-tenant government cloud with four State Government customers.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Securonix Security Operations and Analytics Platform
Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
Securonix Security Operations and Analytics Platform

 The Securonix Security Operations and Analytics Platform combines log management; user and entity behavior analytics (UEBA); next-generation security information and event management (SIEM); network detection and response (NDR); and security orchestration, automation and response (SOAR) into a complete, end-to-end security operations platform.

* automates security operations while our analytics capabilities reduce noise, fine tunes alerts, and identifies threats both inside and out of the enterprise
* delivers analytics driven SIEM, SOAR, and NTA, with UEBA at its core, as a pure cloud solution without compromise.
* delivers unlimited scale, powered by advanced analytics, behavior detection, threat modeling, and machine learning. It increases your security through improved visibility, actionability, and security posture, while reducing management and analyst burden.

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Subagency: National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute
Providers.CSO_Description: The Seven Bridges Platform is a cloud-based environment for conducting bioinformatic analyses. It is a central hub for teams to store, analyze, and jointly interpret their bioinformatic data. The Platform co-locates analysis pipelines alongside the largest genomic datasets to optimize processing. It allocates storage and compute resources on demand, to meet the needs of ever-growing analyses.
ClaimsXM provides the software, program code and business logic to support the operation and management of customer claims processing.

Skillsoft Percipio is the learning experience platform from Skillsoft. Skillsoft is a global corporate learning company that serves 70% of the Fortune 1000 in 160 countries around the world to help them create a future-fit workforce skilled and ready for the jobs of tomorrow. Skillsoft offers 1000s of video-based courses along with best-selling ebooks, audiobooks, practice labs, bootcamps, assessments to help your workforce build skills in the following areas:

* **Leadership** – leading yourself, leading your team, leading your business, and leading digital transformation for your organization
* **Business/power skills** – team management, customer service, project management, effectively using common tools like Microsoft Office, G-Suite, MS Teams, Slack
* **Technology & Developers** – high demand technical skills like cloud computing, Python, DevOps, agile development with sandbox environments to practice coding without the burden of installing software; certification prep for various technical certifications
* **Compliance** – Environment/Health/Safety and Legal Compliance with the capability to customize the courses, enable Code of Ethics attestation, give assessments

Skillsoft Percipio is an award-winning learning platform that delivers on-demand and virtual live learning with many capabilities to engage your learners:  

* **Aspire Journeys Learning Paths:** pre-curated, prescriptive, role-based, and skill-based learning paths that prepare employees for high-demand roles 
* **Curated channels:** offer video-based courses, books, audiobooks, practice labs, test prep for 800+ high demand skills giving the user many options to fit into busy schedules
* **AI-driven personalization:** Allow learners to create playlists, receive assignments, and get AI-driven recommendations that personalize the learning based on their interests and online behaviors
* **Goals, reminders, badges:** to help learners stay motivated and see their progress
* **Practice Labs:** coding and cloud labs in sandbox environments to help learners build confidence in their skills and practice without the burden of installing software
* **Micro-learning videos:** Provide quick, targeted learning focusing on specific tasks delivered in real-time
* **Mobile-friendly:** Enables learners to watch, read, and listen anytime, anywhere, download content for offline use, and use voice-commands for easy access
* **Manage, promote, measure learning:** L&D administrators have the ability to promote content on homepage, customized email notifications, assess learning using visual dashboards, give assignments with due dates
* **Aggregate content from different providers:** turnkey integrations for YouTube, Coursera and others to deliver that content in Percipio with a consistent user experience

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: The Data Cloud on AWS GovCloud
Providers.CSO_Description: Snowflake is the only data warehouse built for the cloud, enabling the data-driven enterprise with instant elasticity, secure data sharing and per-second pricing, across multiple clouds. Snowflake combines the power of data warehousing, the flexibility of big data platforms and the elasticity of the cloud at a fraction of the cost of traditional solutions. Find out more at [https://www.snowflake.com/](https://www.snowflake.com/).

Sprinklr CXM for Government helps organizations create, manage, and optimize customer experiences across various digital channels including social media, messaging, email, and websites. Sprinklr’s AI-backed core platform consists of five products:  Modern Marketing, Modern Advertising, Modern Research, Modern Care, and Modern Engagement.

OpenFLIS is an easily customizable, FedRAMP Ready, cloud-based data collation, retrieval, and dissemination platform that enables users to search and display information across multiple databases, sources, and formats. When coupled with the Synergetics Craft Product Architecture (SCPA) application tool, OpenFLIS provides the ability to reach across technological generations and sources to provide access and visibility to any data in any format. The system consists of the SCPA collation and dissemination tool as well as provisioning, cataloging, search and discovery, Information Management / Knowledge Management (IM/KM), and administrator’s modules that comprise the platform.

The Terida RegTech Framework - CLASsoft™ is a cloud-based claims and electronic-form (e-form) management application, with an integrated optional e-signature module, to receive, evaluate, resolve and track registrations, applications, claims or cases.

With Terida CLASsoft™, persons, events, objects, operations, certifications, communications, documents and workflow are integrated into a single cloud application for application and review process management; credentialing, attestation and certification; compliance and risk management; claims, damages and settlements; incident registries; disaster and emergency management; document and forms management; procurement and supply chain management; litigation mitigation and litigation support.

With CLASsoft™, all information collected and processed, and their chain of custody and access, are secured, managed and protected for the term(s) necessitated by laws, regulations, evidentiary standards and operational requirements.

Providers.Authorizing_Agency: United States Equal Employment Opportunity Commission
Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description:
As the primary point of contact an organization has with its customers and constituents, the T-Metrics TM-Cloud Contact Center provides a powerful skills-based routing platform to efficiently connect these people with the agents best equipped to effectively respond to their needs. The platform provides flexibility, scalability, lower total cost of ownership, improved agency service levels, and a superior customer experience. Service offerings include:

* Skills-based and Priority Routing 
* Interactive Voice Response
* Self-service Offerings
* VIP Treatments
* Omni-channel Communication
* Customer & Agent Callbacks
* Voice and Screen Recordings
* Section 508 compliance (for agents and for callers)
* Advanced Agent and Supervisory Dashboards
* Standard and Custom Reporting
* Administration Portals 
*… [ask about more related capabilities!](https://www.tmetrics.com/support/sales-team)

The TM-Cloud Contact Center can be scaled to accommodate current and future contact center resource demands and requirements. The ability to obtain agent subscriptions in small or large quantities enables organizations to quickly scale to levels necessary to handle even the most dynamic volume, especially for emergencies or seasonal demand.

The contact center distributed architecture ensures that a high-available and high-performance system is deployed in the T-Metrics FedRAMP cloud. Resiliency, scalability, and advanced feature access had been traditionally available to only the largest of contact centers with a significant capital investment. Through the TM-Cloud Contact Center, these advantages are now available to every customer through flexible monthly subscriptions. Strategically designed, TM-Cloud Contact Center capitalizes on cloud architecture and goes over the top of existing customer telephony platforms, including FedRAMP & JITC certified voice solutions. 

For two decades, T-Metrics has provided government agencies with contact center solutions. Additionally, because the T Metrics Contact Center passes the Department of Defense (DoD) rigorous and selective security and interoperability demands for Joint Interoperability Test Command (JITC) certification, T-Metrics contact center solutions are widely deployed at DoD locations around the globe. By receiving FedRAMP In Process status, T Metrics expands the partnership scope to provide the most advanced cloud contact center platform that meets federal mandates for a standardized approach to security assessment, authorization, and continuous monitoring for cloud contact center services.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Totara Talent Development Government Cloud Platform
Providers.CSO_Description:
The Totara Talent Experience Platform for Government & Public Sector, **TotaraGov**, provides adaptable learning management, learning experience, and performance management technologies for Federal, State and Local agencies.   

TotaraGov includes three distinct modules – Totara Learn, Totara Perform and Totara Engage.   Combined, they form a unified talent experience platform for your users, bringing together all the critically important employee experience management tools and processes you need to thrive in your new world of work; learning, employee engagement, collaboration, high performance and, ultimately, productivity.

* **Totara Learn** – An enterprise level learning management system supporting the full range of learning management activities and requirements.  These include, but are not limited to, course and catalog management, compliance and required training, certification management, extensive learning activities including SCORM/AICC, Assessments, Instructor Lead and Virtual sessions, interactive lessons, and a robust reporting platform.  As part of TotaraGov, our Government & Public Sector clients are also provided access to Totara Learning Inc.’s SF-182 module and Enterprise Human Resources Integration (EHRI) reporting solution.

* **Totara Perform** – A performance management module with a focus on ongoing employee development.  Perform features include a full suite of development activities to unlock the power of the organization and the employee and includes a tight integration with the LMS and Engage modules.

* **Totara Engage** – An engagement module that presents a full range of collaboration, content curation, and workspace activities to unlock the Learning Experience in new and innovative ways.

Hosted in Amazon Web Services (AWS) GovCloud, TotaraGov provides a completely managed AWS (SaaS) hosted platform(s) as part of the Totara Learning Inc. AWS ecosystem in AWS GovCloud (US) Region(s).

Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: Department of Health and Human Services
Providers.CSO_Description: United Solutions Artificial Intelligence (US AI) is a suite of scalable AI solutions with broad applicability to common business problems faced by both government and commercial sectors alike. US AI leverages visually exciting user experience / user interfaces to simplify and make complex AI capabilities available to business users. US AI uses various complex data science models such as Natural Language Processing (NLP), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL) to create a curated source of data that provides actionable business insights for a variety of business processes including, but not limited to acquisition, finance, supply chain, logistics, emergency response, and health. The platform memorializes curated data, builds a training model from that, and continuously teaches the machine to make better predictions such as compliance, risk, fraud, value, health, security, and safety.

Vaultara offers an enterprise-wide software-only solution that provides secure, bi-directional electronic transfer to any digital file using Vaultara's Hybrid/SaaS technology. Maximizing security, efficiency, and cost savings, Vaultara offers this solution for quick, secure, contact-less data sharing, drastically reducing the need for physical media. Vaultara is committed to the secure digital delivery of data in the public sector. 

By achieving FedRAMP authorization, the U.S. federal government will be able to deploy Vaultara software across various departments and agencies.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Veracode Online Security Platform for Government
Providers.Sponsoring_Agency: United States Securities and Exchange Commission
Providers.Authorizing_Agency: United States Securities and Exchange Commission
Providers.CSO_Description:
Veracode’s unified platform helps Government developers and application security teams assess and improve the security of applications from inception through production. With a combination of automation, process, and speed, Veracode integrates application security into the software lifecycle, effectively eliminating vulnerabilities during the development/deployment chain. This solution is widely used by enterprises to secure web, mobile, legacy, and third-party enterprise applications, with a simpler and more scalable way to help reduce software security risk across software infrastructure.


Through its FedRAMP offering, Veracode offers the ability to test all the code for your applications, including code you write yourself (with Static Application Security Testing or SAST), open-source libraries (with Software Composition Analysis or SCA), and web-based applications (with Dynamic Application Security Testing or DAST). We also provide eLearning for training in secure software development practices, helping developers learn to fix security issues and avoid introducing new ones. Veracode’s cloud-based model helps scale software security for both small teams and large agencies, without requiring the cost, up front setup, and maintenance of on premise offerings. Additionally, Veracode provides all the security expertise, program planning, education, and remediation guidance that security and development teams need to build a robust application security program.

This service offering has a complete FedRAMP security package that can be leveraged for review and reuse. This service was previously FedRAMP Authorized and will regain its FedRAMP Authorized status once an agency issues an ATO following FedRAMP’s [Quick Guide for Reuse](https://www.fedramp.gov/assets/resources/documents/Reusing_Authorizations_for_Cloud_Products_Quick_Guide.pdf). If an ATO is not issued within one year of the FedRAMP Ready Date the service offering will be removed from the FedRAMP Marketplace. 

Please feel free to contact the PMO at info@fedramp.gov if you have any questions.

Virtru provides seamless end-to-end email encryption, powerful access controls, and unparalleled security - built for the enterprise, yet easy enough for everyone.
Government agencies and large enterprises trust Virtru to protect and control sensitive information – such as regulated personal data and proprietary intellectual property – regardless of where it’s created, stored, or shared. Based on the Trusted Data Format (TDF) open standard, the Virtru Data Protection Platform allows users anywhere, on any device, to work the way they do today – without requiring a separate log-in, user interface, or application.
Enforced through seamless integrations with G Suite, Office 365, and other SaaS business applications, Virtru is offered as a SaaS platform for access control, policy enforcement, and key management.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: VMware Cloud on AWS GovCloud (VMC) - JAB
Providers.CSO_Description:
VMware Government Services (VGS) is a set of cloud service offerings designed to allow US government agencies and customers supporting the US government to move more sensitive workloads into the cloud.

A key offering of VGS is the VMware Cloud™ on AWS GovCloud (US) (VMC) IaaS. VMC brings VMware’s rich Software-Defined Data Center software to the AWS GovCloud (US) Region and enables U.S public sector agencies and customers to securely run production applications across VMware vSphere®-based private, public and hybrid cloud environments, with optimized access to AWS services. Jointly engineered by VMware and AWS, this on-demand service enables IT teams to seamlessly extend, migrate and manage their cloud-based resources with familiar VMware tools. VMC integrates VMware’s flagship compute, storage and network virtualization products (i.e., VMware vSphere®, VMware vSAN™ and VMware NSX®) with VMware vCenter® management.

Providers.Independent_Assessor: A-LIGN Compliance and Security, Inc. dba A-LIGN
Providers.CSO_Description: Waggl is the #1 real time employee voice platform for improving organizational performance. Waggl’s real time crowding-sourcing enables informed decision-making, rapid alignment, and immediate action on topics that matter. Waggl delivers actionable insights to leaders while improving employee engagement through meaningful inclusion and participation.

Wellspring Sophia is a government compliant Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) solution to manage all of the initiatives and activities required in the technology transfer field. Sophia provides over 30 modules, plug-ins, and integrations that include IP management, contract management, reporting, disclosure and project submissions, and more. With more than 15 years in the tech transfer industry and more than 250 institutions using our solutions, Wellspring provides the most complete technology transfer management software available with unparalleled functionality, flexibility, and support staff to professionals in the technology transfer field worldwide.

ITMS™ (Intelligent Telecommunications Management System) is Moderate security level Software as a Service (SaaS) providing cloud-based telecom lifecycle management functions. ITMS™ offers a user-friendly, customizable Web portal interface that allows for online configuration, ordering, tracking, auditing, updating of databases, and the ability to view and generate reports. ITMS™ enables WidePoint to optimize and manage a client’s telecommunications assets, services, contracts, and invoices with transparency and accountability to deliver maximum savings.

WingSwept has provided case management solutions to investigators at government agencies for more than a decade.  WingSwept converted its Case Management & Tracking System (CMTS) into a Commercial Off-The-Shelf (COTS) service offering in 2010.

Built with both security and flexibility in mind, CMTS provides for the secure storage, retrieval, and reporting of case management data for investigative offices at all levels of government.  The CMTS design is neither static nor monolithic.  Intentionally flexible, CMTS provides government agencies with the ability to establish unique naming conventions, tailor agency-specific workflows, and to support a wide range of other user-preferred configurations.  An idle-case tracking function also includes both time and activity-based notifications in order to establish and maintain a seamless agency workflow. 

As an added layer of security, each CMTS customer operates in a secure environment with data separated by customer.  Hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS), CMTS is a web-based, browser-accessible application that requires no device-specific software for implementation.   

Highly customizable dashboards, combined with specialized labels and entry fields provide investigators with the ability to compile and display comprehensive case metrics in a simplified, user-friendly format.  CMTS can display ad-hoc and pre-defined reports in minutes, drastically reducing processing times and increasing staff efficiency. This flexible design allows agencies to tailor workflows in order to match existing processes and to provide for continuity in ongoing investigations.  As a result, CMTS may be readily adapted to serve investigative offices of any size.

Many of the CMTS customers leverage our optional Online Intake Service (OIS) which allows customers to host or leverage OIS hosted internet facing forms which can collect case intakes to be later securely picked up by the agency CMTS server for potential ingestion as a case.

Workday is a provider of enterprise applications for financial management, human capital management, planning, and analytics. Workday Government Cloud is a multi-tenant public cloud-based offering for U.S. federal, state and local government customers, as well as U.S. government contractors, and Federally Funded Research and Development Centers (FFRDCs). It comprises the following enterprise management cloud applications:  Workday Core Financial Management, Projects, Project Billing, Expenses, Procurement, Inventory, Grants Management, Human Capital Management, Cloud Connect for Benefits, Payroll for the United States, Cloud Connect for Third-Party Payroll, Time Tracking, Recruiting, Prism Analytics, and Student.  Also available is Workday Success Plans, a subscription-based success package that provides education, tools, and expertise to help agencies maximize their use of Workday.

Yello's technology (YGRS) helps organizations find, prioritize, manage, engage with, and hire talent. Currently, more than 100 of the Fortune 500 and 20+ federal agencies use Yello to modernize the recruiting process — ultimately helping them find and hire candidates faster. 

Organizations find job candidates by participating in designated recruiting and hiring events (i.e. in-person career fairs, virtual career fairs, job fairs, classroom presentations, info sessions, diversity conferences, webinars, live-stream events, etc.) Organizations invest hundreds of thousands of dollars to plan and attend — in addition to hours of staff time after the event needed to follow up with candidates. YGRS manages this process from end-to-end in one platform, ultimately leading to faster and more efficient hiring decisions and processes.  The solution also helps agencies understand the overall return on investment. 

The solution includes tools to find candidates, manage recruiting events and keep in touch with candidates, all leading to successful hiring.

The Zoom For Government Platform unifies cloud video conferencing, cloud phone system, messaging, simple online meetings, and a software-defined conference room solution into one easy-to-use platform. The solution offers video, audio, phone, and wireless screen-sharing across Windows, Mac, Linux, Chrome OS, iOS, Android, Blackberry, Zoom Rooms, and H.323/SIP room systems. Zoom Products include:

* **Zoom Cloud Video Conferencing** – a cloud-based collaboration service which includes video, audio, content sharing webinars and collaboration.
* **Zoom Phone** - a cloud-based phone system with traditional PBX features, integrated PSTN connectivity, enhanced emergency services, and support for calling from mobile apps, desktop apps, and legacy desk phone devices.
* **Zoom Chat** - send chat messages in public or private channels organized by projects, teams, or topics with the ability to share files, emojis, screenshots, and more.
* **Zoom Rooms** – software-based group video conferencing for conference and huddle rooms that run off-the-shelf hardware including a dedicated MAC or PC, camera, and speaker with an iPad controller.
* **Zoom Room Connector** – a gateway allowing H.323 and Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) systems to connect to Zoom meetings. Room Connector is available in both cloud computing and as software (VM) for installation on the customer premise.
* **Zoom Meeting Connector** – a software (VM) version of the Zoom Cloud infrastructure intended for installation on the customer premise.
* **Zoom API** - provides the ability for developers to easily add Video, Voice and Screen Sharing to your application. Our API is a server side implementation designed around REST. The Zoom API helps manage the pre-meeting experience such as creating, editing and deleting resources like users, meetings and webinars.

Providers.Cloud_Service_Provider_Package: Zscaler Internet Access – Government (Secure Web Gateway – vTIC) - High
Providers.CSO_Description:
Zscaler Internet Access delivers your security stack as a service from the cloud, eliminating the cost and complexity of traditional secure web gateway approaches. By moving security to a globally distributed cloud, Zscaler brings the Internet gateway closer to the user for a faster experience. Organizations can easily scale protection to all offices or users, regardless of location, and minimize network and appliance infrastructure.
**The Cloud and Mobility Have Broken Perimeter Security**
The data center used to be the center of gravity. When applications resided there, it made sense to backhaul traffic from branch offices over a hub-and-spoke network. As traffic patterns shifted to the Internet, gateways were built with stacks of security appliances to allow secure Internet access. These gateways were also centralized to minimize the cost and complexity of securing multiple locations.
However, as applications have moved to the cloud, the center of gravity has moved with it. User traffic often goes straight to the cloud, bypassing the security perimeter. Additionally, today’s complex threats have triggered an explosion of new security appliances, all finding their way into your overworked gateway. Administrators are in a constant battle to keep up with required security updates for their appliances. The complexity of deploying and managing all these appliances — and their associated costs — are out of control. Furthermore, it’s all associated with what is now an outdated architecture.
**Zscaler Internet Access**
Zscaler Internet Access is a secure Internet and web gateway delivered as a service from the cloud. Think of it as a secure Internet onramp — all you do is make Zscaler your next hop to the Internet. For offices, simply set up a router tunnel (GRE or IPsec) to the closest Zscaler data center. For mobile employees, you can forward traffic via our lightweight Zscaler App or PAC file. No matter where users connect — a coffee shop in Milan, a hotel in Hong Kong, or the office — they get identical protection.
Zscaler Internet Access sits between your users and the Internet, inspecting every byte of traffic inline across multiple security techniques, even within SSL. You get full protection from web and Internet threats. And with a cloud platform that supports Cloud Sandboxing, Next-Generation Firewall, Data Loss Prevention (DLP), and Cloud Application Visibility and Control, you can start with the services you need today and activate others as your needs grow.
All these capabilities are delivered from the Zscaler Cloud Security Platform, the world’s largest security cloud, which processes more than 30 billion requests a day. With over 100 patents, the Zscaler platform has been architected from the ground up as a truly distributed, multi-tenant cloud with enterprise performance and scale.
